name: make
signature: <const Id extends string>(identifier: Id) => HttpApi<Id, never, HttpApiDecodeError, never>
description:
An `HttpApi` is a collection of `HttpApiEndpoint`s. You can use an `HttpApi` to
represent a portion of your domain. The endpoints can be implemented later using the `HttpApiBuilder.make` api.
documentation:
An `HttpApi` is a collection of `HttpApiEndpoint`s. You can use an `HttpApi` to
represent a portion of your domain.

The endpoints can be implemented later using the `HttpApiBuilder.make` api.
